Description: Purchased and returned...insanely clean! Capitol Guitars is an authorized Jackson dealer. We are fortunate to be the first dealer in line to receive the 2018 Jackson product line. ORDER WITH US TO GET YOUR GUITAR FASTER THAN ORDERING ANY PLACE ELSE! Please contact us with any questions. The Jackson name has always been synonymous with state-ofthe-art guitar technology and playing, leading the way in crafting instruments that exceed the demands of modern players. Boasting Jackson’s trademark high-speed playability and performance with a mid-range price tag, the X Series Soloist™ SL4X guitar is also the only product in the current lineup to offer a triple single-coil pickup route configuration. With a third Duncan Designed™ HR-101 Hot Rails pickup added between the neck and bridge pickup, we’ve unlocked an even wider and more versatile range of tones. Hot wound rails coupled with a powerful ceramic magnet power this musical beast with the aggressive crunch and sustain hard rock and metal styles demand. With single volume and tone controls and a five-way blade switch, players can explore a variety of pickup combinations, while a Floyd Rose® Special double-locking tremolo (recessed for picking hand comfort) bridge system provides superior string stability, sustain and dynamic tremolo action. Featuring a 25.5” scale length, the SL4X is crafted out of basswood and coupled with a one-piece through-body maple neck with graphite reinforcement and scarf joint, providing stability against the ravages of the road. Wrapped in white binding, its 12”-16” compound radius rosewood fingerboard features 24 jumbo frets and dot inlays. Sleekly designed with bold style, the SL4X is available in eye catching Bubblegum Pink, Daphne Blue or Neon Orange finishes with a single-ply white pickguard, black hardware and a traditional Jackson pointed 6-in-line headstock.• 25.5” scale• Basswood body• One-piece maple neck through-body with graphitereinforcement and scarf joint• 12"- 16" compound radius rosewood fingerboard with 24jumbo frets and dot inlays• White neck binding• S/S/S configuration featuring a Duncan Designed™ HR-101BHot Rails bridge pickup, a Duncan Designed HR-101M Hot Railsmiddle pickup and a Duncan Designed HR-101N Hot Rails neckpickup• Single volume and tone controls, plus five-way blade switch• Recessed Floyd Rose® Special double-locking tremolo bridgesystem• Available in Bubblegum Pink, Daphne Blue or Neon Orangewith a single-ply white pickguard and black hardware• Jackson pointed 6-in-line headstock Series: X SeriesBody Material: BasswoodBody Finish: GlossNeck: 1-Piece Maple Neck-Through-Body with Graphite Reinforcementand Scarf JointNeck Finish: GlossFingerboard: Rosewood, 12” - 16” Compound Radius (304.8 mm to 406.4 mm)Frets: 24, JumboPosition Inlays: DotNut (Material/Width): Floyd Rose® Locking, 1.6875” (42.86 mm)Tuning Machines: Jackson®-Branded Sealed Die-CastScale Length: 25.5” (648 mm)Bridge: Floyd Rose® Special Double-Locking Tremolo (Recessed)Pickguard: 1-Ply WhitePickups: Duncan Designed™ HR-101B Hot Rails (Bridge)Duncan De-signed™ HR-101M Hot Rails (Middle)Duncan Designed™ HR-101N Hot Rails (Neck)Pickup Switching: 5-Way Blade: Position 1. Bridge Pickup, Position 2. Bridge andMiddle Pickup, Position 3. Middle Pickup, Position 4. Middle andNeck Pickup, Position 5.
